ee apata nidahasa labennath prathamawayi. 1860 sapthambara 10 wenida nikuth kala lankalokaya puwathpathe paranima pitapatha shri lanka jathika lekhanarakshaka departhumenthuwa sathuwa pawathinawa. 1911 sapthambar masaye lankawata palamuwenma guwanyanayak gena eeme warthawa sinhala puwathpathaka palawu aakaraya jathika lekhanagaraye ehi jaya pitapath thaba thibenawa, habayi jathika lekhanagaraye satahan walata anuwa me puwath patha palamu sinhala puwathpatha wuwath eya shri lankawe liyapadinchi nokala puwathpathak.

inna mama kiyannam mehemayi une..onna mama ofis wala salli ekathu karan aawa...'' ''...mona sallida..mona ofis walinda?..'' ''...mama oyata kiyala thiyanawane ape kompani ekata posath ratawal walin aadhara hambawenawa api eewa duppath ratawalata yawanawa...ethakota ape hedkwatar eka thiyenne ithaliye rome kiyalath mama kiwwe...?'' ''...ow..ow..ithin..?'' ''...ithin mehe thiyana ape anith ofis wala salli ekathu karan migamuwe ape ofis ekata eewa aran enne mamane..ithin mama ee ofis walin salli ekathu karan anthimata giya jaala ape ofis ekata..gihin eeke sallith aran okkoma thunlaksha asudahak ganan karala brawn pepar bag ekakata dagena mage kar ekata aran aawa..kar eke issaraha dora arala mage fayil eka issaraha sit eka udin thiyala salli bag eka eeka udin thiyala anek paththen gihin kar ekata nagala ewa aran aawa migamuwe ofis ekata..ofis eka langata awith balanakota fayil eka witharak thiyanawa salli bag eka naha...'' ''...ethakota salli bag ekata mokada une...?'' ''...mama danne naha...'' ''...eeka nam wenna bari wadakne...'' ''...eeka thama matath pudume salli bag eka thibune naha..'' ''...poddak inna mata therenne naha..oya hondata kalpana karala mama me ahana eewata uththara denawada...'' ''...hm...'' ''...oya thaniyamada hamadama oya gamana yanne ochchara salli godak genna..?'' ''...ow..me para thibune salli tikayi,kalin para laksha 20 k genawa...ayiyo ee wage dawasak una nam mama iwarayi...'' ''...oyata hondatama shuwarda anthimata jaala ofis eke indan bag eka kar ekata genawa kiyala...?'' ''...ow..ow..mama fayil eka sit eka uda thiyala eeka uda salli bag eka thibba...'' ''...hari..eewa sit eka uda thiyala oya wena kohe hari giyada?..'' ''...naha ane mama eewa sit eka uda thiyala dora wahala anith paththen gihin kar ekata nagga...'' ''...hari..eeta passe kelinma migamu ofis ekata aawada nath nam atharamaga thawa kohe hari giyada hondata mathak karanna...'' ''...na mama kelinma aawe ape ofis ekata..awith kar eka nawaththala salli tika ganna hadanakota fayil eka witharayi thibune...'' ''...kar eke glas aragenada aawe wahagenada?..mehema wenna barida..oya salli thibba paththe glas eka aragena aawe,athara maga oyawa blok ekakata ahu una,oya ahaka balan unna kawuru hari widuruwen athulata atha dala salli bag eka gaththa...???
